00037     class _OgreExport SimpleRenderable : public MovableObject, public Renderable
00038     {

00040         RenderOperation mRenderOp;
00041

00049         SceneManager *m_pParentSceneManager;

00053

00062

00065

00067         virtual void getWorldTransforms( Matrix4* xform ) const;

00071         const Vector3& getWorldPosition(void) const;
00072 
00073
